ygData.subject: Re: Langseax quest?
ygData.msgSnippet: Well, the screenshot on EQ Lizer didnt show it as lore and lore doesnt simply mean it s obtainable from a quest.. it s more of a deterrant to make it not as
ygData.messageBody:
Well, the screenshot on EQ'Lizer didnt show it as lore and lore doesnt
simply mean it's obtainable from a quest.. it's more of a deterrant to make
it not as possible to be "too" good and/or to stop people from camping
expensive items all day to go and sell them.

-----Original Message-----
From: Lord Soth <anacor@...>
To: EverQuest@onelist.com <EverQuest@onelist.com>
Date: Tuesday, August 17, 1999 5:28 PM
Subject: Re: [EverQuest] Langseax quest?


>From: Lord Soth <anacor@...>
>
>> Jonathan wrote:
>>
>> Anyone know where in Halas this quest can be completed and how hard it
>> is? This weapon has pretty damn good stats (6/23 weight 4), almost
>> identical to a silvery war axe and much better than a combine weapon.
>> It's not lore so it can be dual weald as well. Any help would be
>> appreciated.
>
>One would say if its not lore, you cant obtain it from a quest.
